title: Uptown large one bed garden apartment w/heat included $995
posting_body: ['Uptown one bed one bath unit garden unit with upgraded stainless steal appliances with plenty of cabinet space that is open to the dining area.', 'Located 200 feet from Lake Michigan and Margate Park in beautiful beautiful courtyard bldg w/stunning formal lobby.', 'Close to Red Line, easy access to buses.', 'Laundry included(FREE).', 'Bike room.', 'Onsite management.', 'Available for immediate occupancy.', 'Heat and water included.', 'Tenant pays only for electric.', 'Non-smoking building.', 'Up to two cats allowed with an annual pet fee.', 'NO DOGS.', 'Security deposit required.', 'Contact Yvonne today to schedule an on person showing.', '<URL>', 'Uptown is where Chicago residents and visitors go to have fun.', "This is the home of the entertainment district, with everything from walking tours highlighting the hangouts of Chicago to the city's hottest nightclubs and theaters to the best shops and restaurants around.", 'Uptown Chicago stretches along Lake Michigan and includes the popular summer hotspot, Montrose Beach.', 'For those moving to Chicago with a pet, Montrose Dog Beach is also a very popular destination.', "In winter, Cricket Hill is one of the city's favorite sledding spots.", 'Owner pays for water and trash as well as LAUNDRY.', 'Tenant responsible for electric.', 'Read less', 'Wesley Realty Group', '832 Custer Ave', 'Evanston IL 60202']
